item.title: Beocord 5000 (4715/4716): Exchanging the Belts
item.description: After removing the tape mechanism from the Beocord 5000 (4715) for rebuilding, I replaced the old, worn-out belts. My process was largely based on the one shown in my YouTube video. However, I made one key improvement. I learned that the eject lever’s alignment with the tape mechanism is vital for the eject key to function correctly after reassembly. Previously, I had only marked the position of part #256 (“lever”) with a pencil, leading to time-consuming readjustments.
